title: Clinical and imaging characteristics of patent ductus arteriosus in Standard poodles and their crossbreeds
authors: Lim S; Wesselowski S; Kadotani S; Winter RL; Saunders AB
relevance_label: Bernedoodle explicitly listed in abstract cohort (2/30).
relevance_evidence_text: Retrospective multicenter cohort; strong procedural detail but limited Bernedoodle subgroup size and limited external validity for breed-specific inference.

title: AAHA Canine Vaccination Guideline
relevance_evidence_text: Core vaccination framework for canine preventive health.
critical_appraisal: Authoritative guideline source; not breed-specific but high applicability for baseline preventive care.

title: AAHA Nutrition and Weight Management Guidance
relevance_evidence_text: Core nutrition and weight management guidance for dogs.
critical_appraisal: Practical primary-care guidance; non-breed-specific but high utility when breed data are sparse.

title: AAHA Dental Care Guidelines for Dogs
relevance_evidence_text: Core oral health prevention framework for dogs.
critical_appraisal: High preventive-care utility; guideline-level evidence applied as baseline standard.

title: WSAVA Global Nutrition Guidelines
relevance_evidence_text: Global canine nutrition framework used for preventive defaults.
critical_appraisal: International consensus guidance with broad external applicability.

title: CAPC Canine Parasite Control Guidance
relevance_evidence_text: Core parasite prevention standards for dogs.
critical_appraisal: High practical utility for prevention planning; regional adaptation may be required.
